About the Company: Shri Dinesh Mills Ltd is a composite textile mill manufacturing worsted fabrics (menswear), paper makers felts and industrial textiles. The product range of the company includes 100% Wool Worsted Fabrics.55% Polyester/45% Wool Worsted Fabrics.5% Polyester/35% Wool Worsted Fabrics.Wool+lycra/55% Polyester/43% Wool/2% Lycra, other blends can be offered on specific request.Suiting Fabrics -Suiting Fabrics are an intergral part of the fashion industry To satisfy the demands of every discerning consumer, the company offers a vast range of weaves like plains, twills, gabardines, hopsack, barrathea, satins, herringbones and other fancy fabrics, woven in vibrant colors which are inspired by every facet of the universe from the sky to the seas, the forests, the mountains and every awe-inspiring facet of mother earth.
